content.rendered:
Directed by Rob Zombie

Written by Rob Zombie. Norm Liebmann. Ed Haas. Allan Burns. Chris Hayward

Star Sheri Moon Zombie(Lily / Donna Doomley). Jeff Daniel Phillips(Herman / Zombo / Shecky Von Rathbone). Daniel Roebuck(The Count / Ezra Mosher). Richard Brake(Dr. Wolfgang / Orlock). Jorge Garcia(Floop). Sylvester McCoy(Igor). Catherine Schell(Zoya Krupp). Cassandra Peterson(Barbara Carr). Tomas Boykin(Lester). Levente Törköly(Bela Krupp). Jeremy Wheeler(Mr. Gateman). Roderick Hill(Mr. Goodbury). Mark Griffith(Mr. Graves). Viktor Egri(Tin Can Man). Butch Patrick(Tin Can Man (voice)). Norbert Veszelszky(Burt). Attila Török(Jerry). Laurent Winkler(Shelly Von Rathbone). Márton Vincze(Marcel Escargot). Dave Thompson(Pennywhacker (as Dave Thomson)). Fred Coury(Pennywhacker / Raven (voice)). Renáta Krisztina Kiss(Uncle Gilbert (as Renáta Kiss)). Katia Bokor(Transylvania Airlines Flight Attendant). Pat Priest(Transylvania Airlines Announcer (voice)). Dee Wallace(Good Morning Transylvania Announcer (voice)). Val McDaniel(Mr. Gloombottom). Adrian Neven Du Mont(Mr. Gigglesworth). Marika Farkasinszki(Mrs. Gigglesworth). Zoltán Koppány(Lord Butt). Judit Dobos(Lady Fingers). Dusán Vitanovics(Toby Mizzy). Maomi Neven Du Mont(Candy Poops). Jonny Dawson(Creepy Joe). György Hermann(Creepy Jack). Ádám Zambrzyscki(Ape-Man (as Ádám Zambrzycki)). Orsolya Kötél(Woman (as Orsolya Gazdag-Kötél)). László Nádassy(Mummy Waiter). Imre Ponikló(Devil Bat 1). Zalán Póka(Devil Bat 2). Zsigmond Nenyei(Disc Jockey). Bence Balogh(Mummified Waiter). Dóra Köves(Bloody Lady). Miklós Kapácsy(Shady Magoon). Ben Chapman(The Gill Man). Bud Abbott(Slim (archive footage) (uncredited)). Julie Adams(Kay Lawrence (archive footage) (uncredited)). Richard Carlson(Dr. David Reed (archive footage) (uncredited)). Richard Correll(Richard Rickover (archive footage) (uncredited)). Lou Costello(Tubby (archive footage) (uncredited)). Stanley Fafara(Whitey Whitney (archive footage) (uncredited)). Zita Johann(Helen Grosvenor (archive footage) (uncredited)). Boris Karloff(Imhotep (archive footage) (uncredited)). Jerry Mathers(The Beaver (archive footage) (uncredited)). Mark Murray(Alan Boothby (archive footage) (uncredited)). Louis Nye(Zombo (archive footage) (uncredited)). Eddie Parker(Mr. Hyde (archive footage) (uncredited)). Dick Tufeld((archive footage) (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Mike Elliott. Jonathan Halperyn. Daniel Kresmery. Abbey Lessanu. Rob Zombie

Production Capital Arts Entertainment. Hero Squared. Spookshow International
